004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.jni;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.RuntimeLoader;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
010
011/** Pose3d JNI. */
012public final class Pose3dJNI {
013  static boolean libraryLoaded = false;
014
015  static {
016    if (Helper.getExtractOnStaticLoad()) {
017      try {
018        RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
019      } catch (Exception ex) {
020        ex.printStackTrace();
021        System.exit(1);
022      }
023      libraryLoaded = true;
024    }
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Force load the library.
029   *
030   * @throws IOException If the library could not be loaded or found.
031   */
032  public static synchronized void forceLoad() throws IOException {
033    if (libraryLoaded) {
034      return;
035    }
036    RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
037    libraryLoaded = true;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Obtain a Pose3d from a (constant curvature) velocity.
042   *
043   * <p>The double array returned is of the form [dx, dy, dz, qx, qy, qz].
044   *
045   * @param poseX The pose's translational X component.
046   * @param poseY The pose's translational Y component.
047   * @param poseZ The pose's translational Z component.
048   * @param poseQw The pose quaternion's W component.
049   * @param poseQx The pose quaternion's X component.
050   * @param poseQy The pose quaternion's Y component.
051   * @param poseQz The pose quaternion's Z component.
052   * @param twistDx The twist's dx value.
053   * @param twistDy The twist's dy value.
054   * @param twistDz The twist's dz value.
055   * @param twistRx The twist's rx value.
056   * @param twistRy The twist's ry value.
057   * @param twistRz The twist's rz value.
058   * @return The new pose as a double array.
059   */
060  public static native double[] exp(
061      double poseX,
062      double poseY,
063      double poseZ,
064      double poseQw,
065      double poseQx,
066      double poseQy,
067      double poseQz,
068      double twistDx,
069      double twistDy,
070      double twistDz,
071      double twistRx,
072      double twistRy,
073      double twistRz);
074
075  /**
076   * Returns a Twist3d that maps the starting pose to the end pose.
077   *
078   * <p>The double array returned is of the form [dx, dy, dz, rx, ry, rz].
079   *
080   * @param startX The starting pose's translational X component.
081   * @param startY The starting pose's translational Y component.
082   * @param startZ The starting pose's translational Z component.
083   * @param startQw The starting pose quaternion's W component.
084   * @param startQx The starting pose quaternion's X component.
085   * @param startQy The starting pose quaternion's Y component.
086   * @param startQz The starting pose quaternion's Z component.
087   * @param endX The ending pose's translational X component.
088   * @param endY The ending pose's translational Y component.
089   * @param endZ The ending pose's translational Z component.
090   * @param endQw The ending pose quaternion's W component.
091   * @param endQx The ending pose quaternion's X component.
092   * @param endQy The ending pose quaternion's Y component.
093   * @param endQz The ending pose quaternion's Z component.
094   * @return The twist that maps start to end as a double array.
095   */
096  public static native double[] log(
097      double startX,
098      double startY,
099      double startZ,
100      double startQw,
101      double startQx,
102      double startQy,
103      double startQz,
104      double endX,
105      double endY,
106      double endZ,
107      double endQw,
108      double endQx,
109      double endQy,
110      double endQz);
111
112  /** Sets whether JNI should be loaded in the static block. */
113  public static class Helper {
114    private static AtomicBoolean extractOnStaticLoad = new AtomicBoolean(true);
115
116    /**
117     * Returns true if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
118     *
119     * @return True if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
120     */
121    public static boolean getExtractOnStaticLoad() {
122      return extractOnStaticLoad.get();
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Sets whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
127     *
128     * @param load Whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
129     */
130    public static void setExtractOnStaticLoad(boolean load) {
131      extractOnStaticLoad.set(load);
132    }
133
134    /** Utility class. */
135    private Helper() {}
136  }
137
138  /** Utility class. */
139  private Pose3dJNI() {}
140}
